item.title: 摩根大通将通过50亿美元债务交易测试市场对软件的需求
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由摩根大通公司牵头的贷款方集团正准备筹集53亿美元债务，以支持Qualtrics International Inc.收购医疗保健调查公司Press Ganey Forsta。【原文：A lender group led by JPMorgan Chase & Co. is preparing to raise $5.3 billion of debt to support Qualtrics International Inc.’s purchase of health-care survey firm Press Ganey Forsta, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 一款华丽的电子游戏，也充满犹太风情
item.description: 《高盛的永生》是罕见以犹太裔角色为主角的电子游戏【原文：The ‘Eternal Life of Goldman’ is the rare video game to feature a distinctly Jewish protagonist】

item.title: 加州拨款5.9亿美元维持湾区公共交通运行
item.description: 加州州长加文·纽森签署立法，授权该州向旧金山周边主要公共交通运营商提供5.9亿美元贷款，以维持其运营。疫情后出行模式的变化持续给这些运营商的财务状况带来压力。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom signed legislation authorizing the state to lend $590 million to keep major public-transit operators around San Francisco running as post-pandemic travel patterns continue to strain their finances.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局资源不足以监管美联航的安全风险
item.description: 美国政府监督机构指出，美国联邦航空管理局对联合航空控股公司维修操作的监管存在资源不足的问题，这意味着某些安全风险依然存在。【原文：The US Federal Aviation Administration’s oversight of United Airlines Holdings Inc.’s maintenance practices suffers from a lack of resources, meaning some safety risks remain, a government watchdog said.】

item.title: 玻利维亚钢铁制造商考虑从中国贷款中扣除工厂亏损
item.description: 玻利维亚国有钢铁公司正与建造其旗舰工厂的中国工程公司发生纠纷，并表示可能寻求从偿还贷款方中国进出口银行的款项中扣除部分1亿美元的损失。【原文：Bolivia’s state steel company is feuding with the Chinese engineering firm that built its flagship plant, and says it may seek to deduct some of the $100 million in losses from repayments to its lender, the Export-Import Bank of China.】

item.title: 加拿大最大银行正寻求更高回报
item.description: 此外：最高法院裁定特朗普部分关税措施违宪【原文：Also: SCOTUS rules against (some of) Trump’s tariffs】

item.title: 特朗普将在法院关税裁决后举行记者会
item.description: 在最高法院推翻特朗普总统第二任期内实施的大部分全球性关税政策后，特朗普将举行新闻发布会。此举对其标志性经济政策造成重大打击。【原文：President Donald Trump will hold a press briefing after the Supreme Court struck down the bulk of the sweeping global tariffs he’s implemented in his second term, delivering a major blow against his signature economic policy.】

item.title: 欧盟立法者在关税裁决后召开会议讨论美欧贸易协议
item.description: 欧盟立法者将于周一召开紧急会议，重新评估该集团与美国的贸易协议。此前美国最高法院裁定推翻了特朗普总统部分全球性关税措施。【原文：European Union lawmakers will hold an emergency meeting Monday to reassess the bloc’s trade deal with the US following the Supreme Court’s decision to strike down some of President Donald Trump’s global tariffs.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰打造新型私人信贷避风港
item.description: 更多循环融资。【原文：More circular financing.】

item.title: 关于最高法院裁定特朗普关税案的要点说明
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普援引1977年《紧急状态法》中所谓几乎不受限制的关税征收权，采取了史无前例的行动。如今，最高法院裁定此举同样违法。【原文：In invoking what he claimed were virtually unlimited powers to impose tariffs under a 1977 emergency law, US President Donald Trump took unprecedented action. Now, the Supreme Court has determined that it was illegal, too.】

item.title: 美国以安全为由限制向智利官员发放签证
item.description: 美国国务院周五表示，因涉嫌破坏地区安全，美国已对三名未具名的智利政府官员实施签证限制。【原文：The US has imposed visa restrictions on three unnamed Chilean government officials for allegedly undermining regional security, the State Department said Friday.】

item.title: 阿波罗的桑伯尔预见私募股权将面临长期软件困境
item.description: 据阿波罗全球管理公司一位高管透露，私募股权公司正面临软件领域的重大考验，此前它们未能察觉人工智能等技术将颠覆私募股权最青睐的行业之一。【原文：Buyout firms are on the brink of a software reckoning, having failed to spot signs that technologies like artificial intelligence would upend one of private equity’s favorite sectors, according to one of Apollo Global Management Inc.’s top executives.】

item.title: 美国宇航局将阿耳忒弥斯登月任务的新发射目标定为3月6日
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局计划于3月6日发射阿耳忒弥斯二号任务，将宇航员送至月球附近区域，这是自1972年以来首次实现该目标。【原文：NASA is targeting March 6 to launch the Artemis II astronauts to the vicinity of the moon for the first time since 1972.】

item.title: 千禧年资本在私募领域为巴尔干信贷基金筹集更多资金
item.description: 伊齐·英格兰德的千禧管理公司正为信贷对冲基金FourSixThree注入更多投资弹药——去年该公司已向其注资10亿美元。这是这家多策略公司借助外部资金管理现金的最新举措。【原文：Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management is handing credit hedge fund FourSixThree even more investing firepower after first backing it with $1 billion last year — the latest step in the multistrategy firm’s push to tap external funds to help manage its cash.】

item.title: 关税裁决引发1700亿美元退税风波
item.description: 最高法院周五裁定，总统特朗普无权依据紧急状态法征收关税，导致数十家公司缴纳的数百亿美元关税退税问题悬而未决。【原文：Tariff refunds for companies that paid tens of billions were left unresolved by the Supreme Court, which ruled on Friday that President Donald Trump didn’t have legal authority to impose the duties under an emergency law.】

item.title: 最高法院关税裁决后原糖价格获得支撑
item.description: 最高法院推翻了特朗普总统的全球关税政策后，原糖期货短暂扩大涨幅，因该举措可能使最大生产国巴西向美国出口更多糖和乙醇。【原文：Raw sugar futures briefly extended gains after the Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s global tariffs, as the move could allow top producer Brazil to export more sugar and ethanol to the US.】

item.title: 铜价攀升，因最高法院推翻特朗普关税令
item.description: 伦敦铜价上涨，跟随美国股市涨势。此前美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全面互征关税政策，该政策曾对全球贸易前景造成沉重打击。【原文：Copper climbed in London, tracking gains in US stock markets after the Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping reciprocal tariffs, which have weighed heavily on the outlook for global trade.】

item.title: 先锋集团瞄准非美国市场对冲高评级债务风险
item.description: 先锋集团正将目光投向海外市场，以对冲美国投资级公司债的风险敞口。当前该市场估值偏高且预期供应增加，若经济状况意外恶化，市场极易面临重新定价的风险。【原文：Vanguard is looking at overseas markets to help hedge exposure to US investment-grade corporate debt, as elevated valuations and expectations of higher supply leave the market vulnerable to repricing if conditions unexpectedly weaken.】

item.title: 加拿大股市震荡剧烈，因特朗普关税遭推翻
item.description: 加拿大股市基准指数周五早盘短暂飙升，此前美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统的全球关税政策。【原文：Canada’s stocks benchmark briefly spiked higher Friday morning after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s global tariffs.】

item.title: 纽约面临周末后期降雪，东海岸风暴正在增强
item.description: 周末后期的一场风暴可能给美国东海岸部分地区带来降雪，纽约及新英格兰南部地区截至周一可能出现数英寸积雪。【原文：A late-weekend storm could blanket parts of the Eastern Seaboard with snow, with several inches possible in New York and southern New England through Monday.】

item.title: 美国最高法院推翻特朗普关税令，华尔街作出反应
item.description: 美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策后，美国国债和彭博美元指数均出现下跌。【原文：Treasuries and a Bloomberg gauge of the dollar fell after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs.】

item.title: 最高法院撤销特朗普关税后美国国债下跌
item.description: 美国国债价格下跌，此前最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策，该政策曾使美国今年的财政状况有所改善。【原文：Treasuries declined after the Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs that have improved the US fiscal position this year.】

item.title: 马斯克星链套件在伊朗价格飙升，美国威胁开战
item.description: 自伊拉克战争以来美国在中东地区最大规模的部队部署，正推高伊朗境内埃隆·马斯克旗下星链终端设备的黑市价格。当地民众担忧战争可能引发全国范围内的互联网中断。【原文：The biggest US troop deployment in the Middle East since the Iraq War is sending the black market price for Elon Musk’s Starlink terminals soaring in Iran, where people fear a war would trigger another countrywide internet shutdown.】

item.title: 阿斯顿·马丁老板与自己达成的F1协议凸显转型阵痛
item.description: 在复苏势头已然枯竭之际，阿斯顿·马丁董事长劳伦斯·斯特罗尔正与自己达成交易，试图寻找转机。【原文：Looking for momentum in a turnaround that has run out of steam, Aston Martin Chairman Lawrence Stroll is making deals with himself.】

item.title: 安哥拉航空公司计划开通直飞中国航班，力求缩减亏损
item.description: 据《安哥拉日报》周五报道，安哥拉国有航空公司正研究开通首都罗安达与中国广州之间的直飞航线。【原文：Angola’s state-owned airline is studying the introduction of a direct service between the capital, Luanda, and Guangzhou in China, Jornal de Angola reported on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普全球关税遭美国最高法院叫停
item.description: 美国最高法院位于华盛顿。摄影师：格雷姆·斯隆/彭博社【原文：The US Supreme Court in Washington. Photographer: Graeme Sloan/Bloomberg】

item.title: 特朗普全球关税遭美国最高法院驳回
item.description: 美国最高法院推翻了唐纳德·特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策，削弱了其标志性经济政策，并使其自重返白宫以来遭遇了最大的法律挫败。【原文：The US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs, undercutting his signature economic policy and delivering his biggest legal defeat since he returned to the White House.】

item.title: 英德拉建立流程处理与董事长交易中的冲突
item.description: Indra Sistemas SA已概述了特别董事会委员会处理潜在利益冲突的流程，因这家西班牙公司正考虑收购其董事长持有的企业。【原文：Indra Sistemas SA has outlined the process through which a special board committee will address potential conflicts of interest as the Spanish company considers acquiring a firm owned by its chairman.】

item.title: 俄罗斯抛售30万盎司黄金，金价创历史新高
item.description: 俄罗斯央行于1月抛售了其储备黄金，趁着金价攀升至历史高位之际获利。【原文：Russia’s central bank sold gold from its reserves in January, taking advantage of prices that had climbed to record highs.】

item.title: 美国2月消费者信心指数涨幅低于预期
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数2月份涨幅低于预期，原因是富裕阶层的乐观情绪被未能从股市上涨中获益人群的信心下滑所抵消。【原文：US consumer sentiment rose less than expected in February as optimism among wealthier Americans was offset by declining confidence among people who haven’t benefited from stock-market gains.】
